mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.href AS "href", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_url a LEFT JOIN sys_app_url t1 ON t1.url_id=a.id WHERE t1.app_id =#{appId} ORDER BY a.sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_url( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, href, create_by, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{href}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_url SET id = #{id}, parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, href = #{href}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
